reviewText: It's been a while since I saw this tape, but I thought it was the greatest thing since sliced bread when I bought it in the 90s
Off the meat rack, but Vol. 6 is in a class by itself

This tape times in at about 75 minutes, which was a nice surprise. What you get hear is Luke and his crew basically going from strip club to strip club in mostly the south. There is also footage of him getting women to go naked on his tour bus. While there is no actual intercourse shown, there are sex acts performed with bottles, whipped cream, and a little oral thrown in. The great think about the strip clubs is that dudes are actually invited onstage and are allowed to strip down and have acts performed on them. The bad thing is that Luke and his "boys" make a concerted effert to try and humilate some of the dudes that get invited onstage. One stripper actually tries to stick a bottle "where the sun doesn't shine" on one dude wearing bikini briefs. If you go to any of his shows, it looks like you'll have a damn good time. Just be careful about getting onstage. The women are all pretty black women. Only one or two was really fine, but most looked pretty good. Just don't expect to get much around them unless your packing major cash on you. There is about 3 or 4 weak/wack music videos on this tape. You can pretty much fast forward past those. There is a lot of footage of Luke running his mouth talking stuff, but that was cool since its his show. All in all, a damn good show.

It's not as raunchy as Volume 4, but has more beautiful women from the dirty south. This video also includes a few new underground hip hop artist from Miami. The best thing I liked about this video is that Luke used a lot of audience participation and with Luke MCing, things always wonderfully get out of hand.

yo let me tell you i brought this viedo and it was off the hook it has everything you want in a freakshow video!!. this shows Luke on the road in and in some of the hottest strip clubs across the dirty south it also shows some hot hot stripers doing what they do best getting freaky as hell. and the girls really do their thing lets just say affter watching you will have a new respect for beer bottles lol this is a must buy..

Luke has done it again! Not only are these some of the prettiest women alive but they're also the freakest I've ever had the pleasure of worshipping. Simply put, Luke has outdone himself yet again. I can't wait for another!!
